extendedInfo.description: Stop filling in the annoying web form to get Internet access! WiFi Web login can do it for you automatically. Record your Login steps ONCE and WiFi Web Login replays them in the BACKGROUND when required. Works with any WiFi hotspot login, hotel WiFi login, corporate guest WiFi login, and any other WiFi Access point with a captive portal (web login form). Multiple APs supported.This is 3 day DEMO which can be activated into the full version buy purchasing "WiFi Web Login - Activation".WE RESPOND TO ALL EMAIL SUPPORT REQUESTS, so please EMAIL if you need support! We can't help you if you leave a comment on the market! support@syslynx.co.ukJelly Bean compatibility - The first release of Jelly Bean (4.1.1) has a serious defect that breaks all in-app web browsers for all apps. The defect only occurs when you have accessibility services enabled. As a workaround, please disable all accessibility services: Android setting - > Accessibility -> Services . This will be fixed in future Jelly Bean releases.Permissions Explained:- coarse (network-based) location: Required for app anonymous usage statistics.- full Internet access: Required in order to check for Internet access, and post anonymous usage statistics.

reviews.title: Excellent. A life saver
reviews.comment: My isp needs repeated login every 10 minutes. This app keeps loging in and works great. This app is a lifesaver. The only problem is..................   Prompt reply and a promise to fix the issue
reviews.author: Rafeeq Karim

reviews.title: Does the job
reviews.comment: Tried both this and the similarly named app by Ryan DH, this one by SysLynx I felt was the more reliable app at automating my connections to SSIDs requiring post-connect web login.  Certainly worth the activation fee.
reviews.author: Keith Walters

reviews.title: Best. App. Ever.
reviews.comment: This is the kind of app that really should be part of stock android. There is a WiFi network where I work that disconnects you after a certain amount of time, and this app fixes that. I would have no problem paying $5 for this app, just because of how much it simplifies my daily routine.
reviews.author: John Zander

reviews.title: Works but...
reviews.comment: Please update with an option personally name the Wi-Fi connections. Too many public places use the same default Wi-Fi name. Every Starbucks and Sam\'s club uses default \"attwifi\" so every unique location still needs to be logged in manually.
reviews.author: Ricky Eaddy

reviews.title: feature request please.
reviews.comment: tried to join the google+ community to post but I haven\'t been approved. I\'m not sure how you handle the polling for internet connection, but I think it would be helpful to add an option to set a timeout timer so the app isn\'t running in the background constantly. for example my work router assigns leased ip addresses at 20 minutes at a time. so if I could set a timer for 20 mins after the app last ran, it would only need to poll for connection a very short time before having to sign in again.
reviews.author: Ryan Yakus

reviews.title: Great App, works well, good support
reviews.comment: I have come to rely on this app greatly. I have four logins recorded and it connects quickly without me having to do anything. Recently Starbucks changed their login screen and I had some challenges but the support team helped me.
reviews.author: Kawsar Kamal

reviews.title: Made my work WiFi usable
reviews.comment: Have been using for a week now. It is wonderful. Works flawlessly so far. I see in the log that it has done its job several times per day but I have never even noticed. I will be recommending this app to my coworkers at our department meeting tomorrow morning.
reviews.author: Jonathan Nelson

reviews.title: Time and battery saver
reviews.comment: My Galaxy S3 was always connecting to my work wifi and \"thought\" it had a data connection before I ever used my browser\'s login. Boy did it drain my battery when it was trying to sync accounts endlessly... With this app I no longer have that problem, and it was easy to setup. The only problem I\'ve found so far is if you cancel in the middle of recording a login, it will not re-offer the option of recording a login for that network.
reviews.author: Tony Hesketh

reviews.title: Works perfectly
reviews.comment: Works exactly as advertised. I used it on an evo 4G, a GS3 and a nexus 7. All with great success.
reviews.author: Chad Forrester

reviews.title: Does exactly what I need
reviews.comment: What an aggravation trying to remember and type in all the web login info for my wifi spots each time I need to connect or reconnect. What more can I say other than such daily nuisances are now way behind me. Well done. Well done indeed. This should be at the top of everybody\'s recommended app list.
reviews.author: Bob Buchner

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Works exactly as advertised. I have not had a single issue. Sprint Galaxy Nexus 4.2.1 not rooted stock ROM
reviews.author: Steven Kluck

reviews.title: Does exactly what it advertises
reviews.comment: Saves me 20 seconds every time I leave and enter the building at work, so about a minute each work day (5 mins per week, or over 4 hours per year). Not bad for under $2!
reviews.author: Ad Astra

reviews.title: Duplicate SSID Issues
reviews.comment: Love the app, but not willing to spring for the full version until I get some indication that there will be some kind of profile editor or MAC filtering etc.  I installed it and immediately tested it by driving from spot to spot to determine how well it worked.  Set up the AP at Starbucks and recorded my login and left - went to Barnes and Noble - and it recognized my attwifi SSID from Starbucks and logged me into BNs access point.  However, when I drove around the corner to Home Depot - they use attwifi as well - and their script is slightly different than Starbucks and BN and the authentication failed - I recorded the login there and it overwrote my Starbucks/BN settings.  I then drove to McDonald\'s and when i connected to attwifi - the settings from HD were not sufficient to pass on the appropriate credentials to MCD.
reviews.author: Michael Poole

reviews.title: It works great!
reviews.comment: I highly recommend this for my coworkers.
reviews.author: Gifford Hwa

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: I really like this app! It looks like a lot of work was put into it! Unfortunately, I cannot use this because of the 3 day evaluation period. I believe that if this app had no evaluation period, and used some other source of income (ads?), then this app would be much more popular than it currently is, and I\'m sure that more people would even buy the paid version.
reviews.author: James Roe

reviews.title: Simple, fast and reliable.
reviews.comment: Solved my login issues with stupid wifi \"check this box\" and password wifi spots. It is on of those apps you just love because a problem goes away.
reviews.author: Dan Edwards

reviews.title: Problems with ATTWIFI
reviews.comment: As one of the other reviews points out, this application works fantastic, except there\'s no mechanism to have different logins for the same SSID.  This is problematic for me with the \"attwifi\" SSID, since Starbucks, Home Depot, and many others use the same SSID, but have slightly different landing pages.  Basically, the app that\'s supposed to automatically sign me into WiFi fails on one of the most common free WiFi providers because of this.  It really needs a way to distinguish which script to run by something in addition to the SSID (say, a tag on the page like the <TITLE> element, or something).
reviews.author: Scott Ellis

reviews.title: Fantastic program!
reviews.comment: Wifi is available nearly everywhere I go, and all of it requires a log in of some sort.   This application saves me so much time, especially at school where I have to constantly login throughout the day.   I had some difficulty in saving settings for AT&T wifi at Kinkos, but trying the next day worked just fine. Emailed the dev and received a prompt response - Great support!
reviews.author: Francis Kang

reviews.title: Unbelievable support!
reviews.comment: This app is great! And I am absolutely amazed at the amount of effort the developer is putting into fixing one small defect I found. Thank you!
reviews.author: Carmine Cristallo
